post.description: Create a new property in the database.

get.description:
Get a list of properties with minimal information needed for the frontend.
Optimized for frontend listing views with filtering by developer.

Get a detailed view of a single property.
Optimized for frontend detail views.

put.description: Update an existing property with new data.

delete.description: Delete a property from the database.

get.description:
Get a list of purchases with property information and enhanced filtering.
Optimized for frontend listing views.

put.description: Update an existing purchase by purchase_id.

get.description:
Get a detailed view of a single purchase with property information.
Optimized for frontend detail views.

post.description: Create a new loan and automatically create a payment source for it.

get.description:
Get a list of loans with essential information for the frontend.
Optimized for frontend listing views with enhanced filtering.

put.description: Update the details of an existing loan and its associated payment source.

delete.description: Delete a loan and its associated payment sources, if they have no associated payments.

get.description:
Get a detailed view of a single loan with property information.
Optimized for frontend detail views.
Get a list of payments with property and invoice information
Get a detailed view of a single payment with property and invoice information

Get a list of loan repayments with enhanced information.
Optimized for frontend listing views with improved filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Loan Repayments Repayments  Get

put.description: Update an existing loan repayment by ID.

delete.description: Delete a loan repayment by ID.

get.description:
Get a detailed view of a single loan repayment.
Optimized for frontend detail views.

schema.title: Response Get Payment Sources Payment Sources  Get

get.description: Get a list of invoices with property information and enhanced filtering
Get a detailed view of a single invoice with property information

schema.title: Response Get Construction Statuses Construction Status  Get
Response Get Acquisition Cost Summary Acquisition Cost Summary  Get
Response Get Acquisition Cost Details Acquisition Cost Details  Get
Response Get Loan Repayment Summary Loan Repayment Details Summary  Get

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Schema for detailed view of a single invoice, extending public schema with additional details.

InvoiceCreate.title: InvoiceCreate
InvoiceCreate.description: Schema for creating a new invoice, inheriting all base invoice details.

InvoiceOld.title: InvoiceOld
InvoiceOld.description: Schema for representing an existing invoice with additional metadata like ID and timestamps.

InvoicePublic.title: InvoicePublic
InvoicePublic.description: Schema for listing invoices with property and purchase details.

InvoiceUpdate.title: InvoiceUpdate
InvoiceUpdate.description: Schema for updating invoice details, allowing partial updates with optional fields.

Loan.title: Loan
Loan.description: Schema for detailed view of a single loan, including additional financial details.

LoanCreate.title: LoanCreate
LoanCreate.description: Schema for creating a new loan, extending the base loan schema with a user ID.

LoanOld.title: LoanOld
LoanOld.description: Schema for representing an existing loan with additional metadata like creation and update timestamps.

LoanPublic.title: LoanPublic
LoanPublic.description: Schema for listing loans with essential information for the frontend.

LoanRepayment.title: LoanRepayment
LoanRepayment.description: Schema for detailed view of a single loan repayment, extending public schema with additional details.

LoanRepaymentCreate.title: LoanRepaymentCreate
LoanRepaymentCreate.description: Schema for creating a new loan repayment, inheriting all base repayment details.

LoanRepaymentOld.title: LoanRepaymentOld
LoanRepaymentOld.description: Schema for representing an existing loan repayment with additional metadata like ID and timestamps.

LoanRepaymentPublic.title: LoanRepaymentPublic
LoanRepaymentPublic.description: Schema for listing loan repayments with essential information for the frontend.

LoanRepaymentUpdate.title: LoanRepaymentUpdate
LoanRepaymentUpdate.description: Schema for updating loan repayment details, allowing partial updates with optional fields.

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Schema for detailed view of a single payment, extending PaymentPublic with additional fields.

PaymentCreate.title: PaymentCreate
PaymentCreate.description: Schema for creating a new payment, inheriting from PaymentBase.

PaymentOld.title: PaymentOld
PaymentOld.description: Schema for representing an old payment record with additional metadata.

PaymentPublic.title: PaymentPublic
PaymentPublic.description: Schema for listing payments with essential information for the frontend.

PaymentUpdate.title: PaymentUpdate
PaymentUpdate.description: Schema for updating payment details, allowing optional fields for partial updates.

Property.title: Property
Property.description: Schema for detailed view of a single property, extending public schema with additional details.

PropertyCreate.title: PropertyCreate
PropertyCreate.description: Schema for creating a new property, inheriting all base property details.

PropertyOld.title: PropertyOld
PropertyOld.description: Schema for representing an existing property with additional metadata like ID and timestamps.

PropertyPublic.title: PropertyPublic
PropertyPublic.description: Schema for listing properties with minimal information needed for the frontend.

Purchase.title: Purchase
Purchase.description: Schema for detailed view of a single purchase, extending public schema with additional details.

PurchaseCreate.title: PurchaseCreate
PurchaseCreate.description: Schema for creating a new purchase, inheriting all base purchase details and adding user ID.

PurchaseOld.title: PurchaseOld
PurchaseOld.description: Schema for representing an existing purchase with additional metadata like ID, user ID, and creation timestamp.

PurchasePublic.title: PurchasePublic
PurchasePublic.description: Schema for listing purchases with essential information for the frontend.
